siteConstruction.label: Site Construction
siteConstruction.description: Costs related to site development, foundation, and physical setup.

officeAndLabEquipments.label: Office & lab equipments
officeAndLabEquipments.description: Costs of furnishing office space and equipping labs.

hvacSystem.label: HVAC System
hvacSystem.description: Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning system setup.

LiquidCoolingSystem.label: Liquid Cooling System
LiquidCoolingSystem.description: Advanced cooling system for miner heat dissipation.

importDuties.label: Logistics & Import Duties
importDuties.description: The Logistics and Import Duties for miner and container importation to site.

labor.label: Labor & Engineering Fees
labor.description: The Labor paid for the installation of the equipment on site, excluding building and foundation work.

coolingContainer.label: HW5 Cooling Container
coolingContainer.description: Container unit providing integrated hydro cooling for mining hardware.

miner.label: Antminer Price
miner.description: Price of one Antminer hardware unit.

antminerPower.label: Power Consumption (W)
antminerPower.description: Average power consumption of an Antminer in watts.

antminerPowerFluncPercentage.label: Power Fluctuation (%)
antminerPowerFluncPercentage.description: Estimated variation in power usage due to fluctuations.

antminerHashrate.label: Hashrate (TH/s)
antminerHashrate.description: The processing power of a miner in terahashes per second.

antminerMaintenanceAnually.label: Annual Maintenance Cost ($)
antminerMaintenanceAnually.description: Annual maintenance cost for each Antminer.

antminerDepreciationPercent.label: Depreciation (% per year)
antminerDepreciationPercent.description: Yearly depreciation percentage of each Antminer.

rewardPerTh.label: Reward per TH (BTC) 5.18e-7
rewardPerTh.description: Estimated Bitcoin reward earned per terahash.

panel.label: Panel Price
panel.description: Cost of one solar panel unit.

solarPowerDuration.label: Sunlight Duration (hrs/day)
solarPowerDuration.description: Average sunlight hours per day available for solar power.

solarPanelRating.label: Panel Rating (W per panel)
solarPanelRating.description: Energy output per panel under standard conditions (W).

batteryCapacity.label: Battery Capacity (kWh)
batteryCapacity.description: Total usable capacity of each battery.

generatorPowerFactor.label: Generator Power Factor
generatorPowerFactor.description: The efficiency factor that determines how much real power is delivered by the generator relative to its apparent power. Usually between 0.8 and 1.

generatorRedundancyPercentage.label: Generator Redundancy (%)
generatorRedundancyPercentage.description: A percentage representing the additional capacity to account for unexpected loads or generator failures.

generatorDepreciationPercentage.label: Generator Trade Loss (%)
generatorDepreciationPercentage.description: Estimated percentage of value loss for a generator when selling and upgrading.

generatorSelectionOptions.label: Current Generator Selection:
generatorSelectionOptions.description: A dictionary of generator capacities (in kVA) and their associated costs, allowing the software to select an appropriate generator based on load.

transformer.label: Transformer Price
transformer.description: Total cost of the transformer needed to adapt voltage levels for different components in the system.

transformerKVA.label: Transformer Capacity (kVA)
transformerKVA.description: The rated capacity of the transformer in kilovolt-amperes (kVA), indicating the maximum load it can handle.

inverterSelectionOptions.label: Current Inverter Selection:
inverterSelectionOptions.description: A dictionary of inverter capacities (in kW) and their corresponding prices, used to match the system's energy needs with appropriate inverters.

powerCostPerKWh.label: Power Cost per kWh ($)
powerCostPerKWh.description: Cost of electricity per kilowatt-hour. This is used to calculate the monthly and yearly electricity expenses.

hvacPercentMaintenanceAnually.label: HVAC Maintenance (% yearly)
hvacPercentMaintenanceAnually.description: Annual maintenance cost of the HVAC system, expressed as a percentage of its original cost.

insuranceAnnualPercentage.label: Insurance (% yearly)
insuranceAnnualPercentage.description: Annual insurance cost expressed as a percentage of the total asset value or insured components.

annualSalaries.label: Annual Salaries ($)
annualSalaries.description: Total yearly salaries paid to on-site staff responsible for operations and maintenance.

annualInternet.label: Annual Internet Cost ($)
annualInternet.description: Yearly cost of internet service used to manage, monitor, or run operations remotely.

investmentPeriod.label: Investment Period:
investmentPeriod.description: Duration of the mining investment in months or years. Influences long-term profitability projections.

minersSlider.label: Starting Antminers:
minersSlider.description: Number of Antminers to begin the simulation with. Increasing the count impacts cost, power consumption, and revenue.

solarSlider.label: Solar Load Percentage:
solarSlider.description: Percentage of the mining operation's power consumption expected to be supplied by the solar system.

reinvestSlider.label: Monthly Reinvestment (%):
reinvestSlider.description: Monthly percentage of profits to be reinvested into expanding mining capacity or upgrading infrastructure.

reinvestStrategy.label: Reinvest Strategy:
reinvestStrategy.description: The selection dictates wether the reinvestment should prioritize Solar Energy or Miner count.

btcPrice.label: Bitcoin Price (USD)
btcPrice.description: Current market price of Bitcoin in USD. This affects the revenue calculation from mining activities.

assetDepreciation.label: Asset Depreciation (%)
assetDepreciation.description: Estimated percentage of Asset value lost each year cumulatively.
